overall_objective: Achieve 0 errors in n8n workflow - all nodes functioning correctly

phase_1_summary.key_blocker: n8n Cloud authorization prevents historical execution viewing
phase_1_summary.workaround: Fresh execution triggered in Editor tab - nodes now have real-time output data

FELIX.findings: ✅ Feature flags confirmed: Pinterest=image, Instagram=video, TikTok=video, Quality=60

SIGMA.current_mission: NOW that workflow just executed in Editor tab: Click on '4.4b-1 Start Sora Video' node in the workflow canvas (NOT executions tab). The node should show green checkmark and have OUTPUT tab with data. Screenshot and report the Sora API response.

DELTA.current_mission: Click on '4.4a Handle Image Result' node in workflow canvas. It should show output data. Report if source='dalle3' or 'github_fallback'. Screenshot the output.

ROMEO.current_mission: Click on '4.2 Route Media Generation' node. Should show 3 output items. Report if sora_prompt fields are present for Instagram and TikTok items. Screenshot.

ALPHA.current_mission: Click on '4.6 Aggregate Media' node. Report final pinterest_media, instagram_media, tiktok_media URLs and sources. Screenshot.

notes: Fresh execution completed. Title shows warning icon (⚠️). Agents should now be able to click nodes in Editor canvas and see OUTPUT tabs with data from this execution. Waiting for Phase 2 reports to identify specific errors.
